reporter_caption.center: ALVAREZ FAMILY TRUST v. ASSO. OF APARTMENT, 122 Haw. 545 (2010)

caption.center: Alvarez Family Trust v. Association of Apartment Owners of

opinion.posture: CERTIORARI TO THE INTERMEDIATE COURT OF APPEAL (CIV. NO. 05-1-0013)
opinion.attorneys:
Terrance M. Revere and Rebecca A. Szucs (of Motooka Yamamoto Revere), for petitioner/plaintiffs-appellants.
Matt A. Tsukazaki (of Li Tsukazaki), for respondent/defendant-appellee.
opinion.panel: By: MOON, C.J., NAKAYAMA, J., and Circuit Judge NISHIMURA, assigned by reason of vacancy; ACOBA, J., dissenting, with whom DUFFY, J., joins).
opinion.opinion_text:
ORDER DENYING PETITIONERS/PLAINTIFFS-APPELLANTS' MOTION FOR RECONSIDERATION, FILED DECEMBER 21, 2009 Upon consideration of petitioners/plaintiffs-appellants' motion for reconsideration, filed December 21, 2009, the papers in support thereof and in opposition thereto, and the record herein,
IT IS HEREBY ORDERED that the motion is denied.
